nodes.text: Chopper was a male Nautolan criminal and a member of the notorious gang known as the Fondor Five. During the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, the gang was spotted operating on Coruscant. Because of the gang's violent tendencies, the Coruscant Security Force placed a high bounty on their heads. The bounty was eventually collected after all five gang members were killed in a firefight in the Fartrader Lounge.
Chopper appears in the BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic as one of the five targets of the Heroic mission "Republic's Most Wanted".
